nodes.text: The berbersian crab salad was a dish that consisted of crisp Naboo lettuce and buttered crab sticks. It could be served with dindra sauce. In her attempt to convince the famished Lina Graf to trust her, the bounty hunter Shalla "the Shade" Mondatha once made her berbersian crab salad.

Berbersian crab salad was first mentioned in the novel Adventures in Wild Space: The Steal, written by Cavan Scott and published on June 30, 2016. In the Star Wars Legends novel Death Star, there is a mess hall dish named berbersian crab.
